title: Productivity Tuesday Ep#3 -- Evernote for Beginners
description:
Try Evernote premium for FREE --  https://goo.gl/2f10ys

Welcome to the third episode of productivity Tuesday. Today, we are going to take a look at Evernote -- the popular note taking application. 

This is the beginners tutorial for Evernote. 

[Video content]

#1 What exactly is Evernote
#2 Practical use case of Evernote
#3 Free and premium plan
#4 Understand the basic structure
#5 6 Ways to add content to Evernote
#6 How to organize effectively
